title: ConfigureWebpack Task Configuration
description: Defines parameters for the webpack bundler

libraryName.title: Library Name
libraryName.description: optional library name - set this if the library should be a global on the window

linkedExternalsToBundle.title: Linked Externals to Bundle
linkedExternalsToBundle.description: List of linked externals that should be bundled. Not recommended for normal use.

disableAsyncComponentLoading.title: Disable Async Component Loading
disableAsyncComponentLoading.description: If set to true, don't inject the async component loading code if components are only used in async chunks

assetsAreVersioned.title: Assets are versioned
assetsAreVersioned.description: If set to true, drop release assets in an "assets-versioned" folder instead of "assets".
